ZIP_CODE_DESCRIPTION: Zip Code (It is needed just in case that we need to connect you with an Assistant near you)
CREDIT_SCORE_DESCRIPTION: Credit Score (It will help us understand I you are ready)
MONTHLY_INCOME_DESCRIPTION: Monthly Income (How much do you approximately get paid monthly)
MONTHLY_DEBTS_DESCRIPTION: Monthly Debts (Add up all your credit cards minimum payments + Car payment + the mortgage payment if you own ahother property)

FORM_ERROR.NUMBER: This field must be only numbers

WELCOME_.WELCOME: Hey, thanks for stopping by! We are thrilled to hear that you are interested in buying a home.
WELCOME_.ABOUT_WE: We’re a team of professionals helping our clients find their easy way to buy a house and guide them throughout the process.
WELCOME_.OUR_WORK: Our work involves answering all your queries, presenting you valuable tips, and assisting you to connect with the best professionals in your area.
WELCOME_.CALL: Want to have an introduction call?

MAIN_SCREEN.TITLE: Buying a house can be an intimidating process, but there is no need to panic we are here to help.
MAIN_SCREEN.BUYING_PROCESS: The process of buying a house.
MAIN_SCREEN.CARD_BODY_ONE: Firstly, you need a pre-approval letter to work with a real estate agent. Click here to get your pre-approval letter.
MAIN_SCREEN.CARD_BODY_TWO: Choose your real estate agent wisely, and it will make a lot of processes easy for you. To contact top agents of your area.
MAIN_SCREEN.CARD_BODY_THREE: You should provide your real estate agent with a list of the priorities you’re looking for in your future house. Click here to see which ones are they.
MAIN_SCREEN.CARD_TITLE_FOUR: Get your Home Inspected and Appraised
MAIN_SCREEN.CARD_BODY_FOUR: Once your offer is approved, you need to start looking for a home inspector in your area. Click to find out what you need to know.
MAIN_SCREEN.CARD_BODY_FIVE: Before making the deal, have a last thorough self-walk in the house to verify that everything is ok.

PRE_APPROVED.FIRST_TEXT: Now it has become easier to get your pre-approved letter and to know whether you qualify for a house mortgage or not.
PRE_APPROVED.FILL_SURVEY_FORM: Please fill in the information below as accurately as possible.
